_note: Set mainnet to true for real Bitcoin operations (be careful!)
_key_import_note: Use only ONE of the following key import options:

_field_descriptions.mainnet: boolean - Use Bitcoin mainnet (true) or testnet (false)
_field_descriptions.count: integer - Number of addresses to generate
_field_descriptions.amount: float - Amount in BTC to send to each address
_field_descriptions.no_funding: boolean - Generate addresses only, skip funding
_field_descriptions.output: string - Output filename for generated addresses
_field_descriptions.wallet_name: string - Name of the funding wallet
_field_descriptions.max_fee: float - Maximum transaction fee in BTC
_field_descriptions.batch_size: integer - Number of addresses to fund per transaction
_field_descriptions.private_key: string - Private key in hex format for wallet import
_field_descriptions.mnemonic: string - Mnemonic phrase for wallet import
_field_descriptions.key_file: string - Path to file containing private key or mnemonic
